Uses of Package
io.crums.sldg

Packages that use io.crums.sldg
Package Description
io.crums.sldg  
io.crums.sldg.bags
Interfaces for retrieving a information about a subset of data from a ledger.
io.crums.sldg.db  
io.crums.sldg.demo.jurno  
io.crums.sldg.json  
io.crums.sldg.packs
Implementation classes for various bags.
io.crums.sldg.scraps
Discarded or deprecated things linger here before getting purged.
  • Classes in io.crums.sldg used by io.crums.sldg
    Class Description
    CamelPath
    A concatenation of 2 SkipPaths.
    Ledger
    A skip ledger (new terminology).
    Path
    A list of connected rows in a SkipLedger with strictly ascending row numbers.
    PathIntersector
    An iteration over the intersections of a pair of paths.
    Row
    A row in a ledger.
    RowIntersect
    Classification of how a pair of rows intersect.
    RowIntersection
    A pair of intersecting rows.
    SkipPath
    A path in V-form (the shape the list of paths looks like if printing a line per row).
    SldgException
    Base exception in the skipledger module.
    Table
    Storage interface for skip ledger.
    TargetPath
    A path whose target row is not necessarily the first row.
    UniquePairIntersector
